semantic_identifier: 145: feat: Issue prioritization v2: introduce multi-dimension scoring schema + API contract (backwards compatible)

sections.text:
## Description

This PR adds the backend schema and API contract needed for Issue Prioritization v2 to support multi-view scoring, while keeping the existing single-score behavior intact.

Changes
- Data model: introduces a normalized representation for per-dimension scoring.
  - Stores scores per dimension (e.g., support_sla_risk, product_impact, sales_deal_blocker).
  - Stores per-dimension weights.
  - Stores a computed aggregated score.
  - Keeps the existing legacy single-score field(s) and treats them as the fallback source of truth when v2 fields are absent.
- Migrations: adds new tables/columns needed for v2 scoring and includes a safe backfill path so existing issues continue to return the same prioritization score.
- API contract:
  - Extends issue prioritization read responses to optionally return `scoresByDimension`, `weightsByDimension`, and `aggregatedScore`.
  - Accepts v2 scoring payloads on write/update endpoints while still supporting legacy single-score inputs.
  - Defines deterministic aggregation behavior (weighted sum) when v2 fields are provided; otherwise returns the legacy score.
- Compatibility/rollout:
  - No UI changes.
  - No saved profile/tuning controls included.
  - Existing clients can continue using the legacy score without changes; newer clients can start sending/reading v2 fields.

Notes
- This is intentionally scoped to schema + API surfaces only (low priority): scoring dimensions, profile management, and tuning controls will be implemented in follow-up PRs.

## How Has This Been Tested?
